entry.title: replace-by-fee v0.10.0rc4
entry.summary: In this context, Tamas Blummer addresses Mike regarding Peter's pull request, stating that although it may be risky, they cannot claim that Bitcoin core code is meant to be forked and then be disappointed when it happens. Blummer also questions whether protecting unconfirmed transactions should be prioritized over fostering innovation and not depending on them. The email includes an HTML attachment and a signature from Blummer using OpenPGP with GPGMail.
